אחזקת דירות ברמה מעל כולם: Apartment Maintenance at a Superior Level
חברת E.i Grupe מתמחה במתן שירותי ניהול ו: E.i Grupe specializes in high-level building management and maintenance services for businesses, companies, and residential committees. The company is managed by Eliran Shmuel and Tzachi Vaknin, who have extensive experience in the field. We offer a wide range of building maintenance services, including: Rent collection from tenants, Building upkeep to ensure proper living conditions, Management and resolution of plumbing, electrical, and other issues.Our services are provided with the support of top professionals in the field, offering reliable and efficient service with 24/6 availability for any building-related issues.
תחזוקת דירות כוללת מגוון רחב של שירותים,: Property maintenance includes a wide range of services, each contributing to safety, comfort, and aesthetics in the property. These include:
תחזוקה שוטפת כוללת פעולות קטנות אך חשובו: Routine maintenance includes small but essential actions like checking electrical systems, paint repairs, and moisture control. Such maintenance can help prevent larger damages in the future.
בעיות אינסטלציה כמו נזילות, סתימות והצפו: Common plumbing issues like leaks, clogs, and floods are among the most frequent problems in properties. Proper maintenance helps identify these issues early and solve them before they worsen.
שיפוצים חלקיים או מלאים של הדירה יכולים: Partial or full renovations of the property can significantly improve living quality and increase its value. Renovations include replacing flooring, upgrading kitchens, remodeling bathrooms, and more.
מערכת החשמל היא אחת המערכות הקריטיות בכל: The electrical system is one of the most critical systems in any property. Routine maintenance includes periodic checks, fixing issues, and replacing old systems with modern, safer alternatives.
אם הדירה כוללת מרפסת או גינה, חשוב לשמור: If the property includes a balcony or garden, it’s essential to keep it well-maintained. Garden maintenance includes pruning, watering, lawn care, and pest control when necessary.
גבייה - אנחנו נדאג באופן שוטף לתשלום השכ: Collections - We will ensure regular rent payments and handle additional services directly with the tenant.

מענה אנושי - מענה אנושי 24/6 לכל תקלה או: Human Response - 24/6 human response for any issue or question.
הכנת הנכס לשכירות - חברתינו מתמחה במתן ש: Preparing the Property for Rent - Our company specializes in providing property enhancement services through skilled professionals.
הקמת דוח הוצאות שנתי לבעלי הנכס: Establishment of an Annual Expense Report for Property Owners.
